name: Ocean Nomad: Survival on Raft
description: You are floating in the middle of the ocean on a few wooden planks. Catch resources from the water to expand the raft. Craft gear and weapons to fight off a ferocious shark. Sail to islands and see what lies in wilds! A perilous adventure awaits!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 110 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 110 MB available space
